next-steps.title: Next Steps:
next-steps.stepOne: Send an email, to let the account users know the message has been published. (FEATURE IN DEVELOPMENT)

email-form.title: Published Communication  Message
email-form.acknowledgement: I understand that submitting this form will notify all intended eligible users.

communication-admin-listing-help.title: Message Center Administration
communication-admin-listing-help.message:
Create & Edit Communication Messages to Dealer and Partner Accounts

This feature allows authorized users to create, edit, and publish communication messages targeted at specific dealer and partner accounts. You can tailor messages based on various account attributes such as:

  • Account Type: Dealer, Distributor, Subsidiary
  • Product Line: Single or multiple product lines
  • Customer Class: All or selected customer classes
  • Sales Territory: Individual or multiple territories
  • Geography: Country or state-specific targeting
  • Specific Accounts: Individual dealers or partners
Key Capabilities
  • Multi-language Support: Create and edit messages in languages other than English.
  • Time Zone & Scheduling: Schedule communications for specific time zones and time frames.
  • Message Customization: Define language, title, message body, keywords, notes, and visibility settings.
  • Publishing Workflow: Save drafts, preview messages, and publish to selected audiences.

You can search or filter communications with the available predefined filters in the display below.

You will be able to delete only draft communications which are not published. To disable a communication, edit and set the status to Inactive.

add-edit-help.title: Create & Edit Communication Messages to Dealer and Partner Accounts
add-edit-help.message:
This feature allows authorized users to create, edit, and publish communication messages targeted at specific dealer and partner accounts. You can tailor messages based on various Account and User attributes.

Instructions
  • Add or edit communication messages.
  • Complete all required and relevant attributes.
  • Communications will only appear to dealers once the Publish button is clicked in the final step.

communication-status.title: Communication Status
communication-status.message:
• Draft: Message is saved but not visible to dealers.
  • Active: Message is published and visible to targeted dealer accounts.
  • Inactive: Message is hidden from dealers but retained for reference or future use.

group.title: Communication Groups
group.message:
Messages can be categorized under the following groups:

Dealer Home Page Communications

  • Alerts
  • Programs
  • Communications

Video: These communications will appear on Polaris Connect widget/app from dealer home page.

Application-Specific Communications

  • NorthStar: NorthStar certification dashboard
  • Service: Certified Service dashboard

sub-group.title: Communication Sub-Groups
sub-group.message:
Messages can be further organized into sub-categories under the following groups:

  • Alerts: Recall or Update
  • Video: Recall

timeframe.title: Timeframe & Scheduling
timeframe.message:
Communications can be scheduled based on time zone-specific timeframes, ensuring messages reach dealers at the most relevant local time.

Example: When a communication is set to go live at 1 PM Central Standard Time, all dealers throughout the globe will see this message at 1 PM Central Standard Time.

polaris-option-dealer-of-distributor.title: Send Communication to all Dealers of a Distributor
polaris-option-dealer-of-distributor.message:
Steps:

  • Select the check box “Dealer of Distributor” option.
  • Select the distributor(s) account by searching by name.
  • Continue to complete the other required communication attributes.

polaris-option-dealer-of-subsidiary.title: Send Communication to all Dealers of a Subsidiary
polaris-option-dealer-of-subsidiary.message:
Steps:

  • Select the check box “Dealer of Subsidiary” option.
  • Select the Subsidiary account by searching by name.
  • Continue to complete the other required communication attributes.

confirm-delete-selection.title: Are you sure you want to delete all selected data entries?

confirm-delete-draft.title: Are you sure you want to delete the selected communication?
confirm-delete-draft.message: This communication will be permanently deleted in 30 days.

skip-translation.title: Skip Translation?
skip-translation.message: You're about to skip the translation step. You can return to this step at any saved point to complete it later.

delete-translation.title: Are you sure you want to delete the {{0}} translation?
delete-translation.message: This action will permanently delete the translated message and cannot be undone.

revert-translation.title: Revert to Saved Message
revert-translation.message: Are you sure you want to revert to saved message? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

discard-edit-translation.title: Discard Changes
discard-edit-translation.message: Are you sure you want to cancel your updates to the translated message? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

translation-saved.title: Translation Update Saved
translation-saved.message: Your translation has been successfully saved. Please note that any additional languages will need to be updated separately.

confirm-auto-translate.title: Are you sure you want to auto-translate?
confirm-auto-translate.message: This will overwrite the current content with an auto-generated translation.

account-target-required.title: Account Target Required
account-target-required.message:
You haven't selected a required Account Target. You can continue on, but you will need to return and complete this step before you can publish your communication.

Would you like to proceed?

discard-unsaved-changes.title: Discard Changes
discard-unsaved-changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to discard your changes and proceed?

attachment-add.warning: Attachment(s) {{fileNames}} were not added because they are duplicates. Please delete the existing file and re-upload if you want to update.

get-communication.failed: Communication was not found. Please try again later.

account-targets-help-text: Select to indicate to whom the message should appear, for example to a specific dealer or group of dealers.
user-targets-help-text: Select the audience for your message.
filters-help-text: Filters apply when target categories are checked. Uncheck to view all.
generic-upload-error: An error occurred while uploading the file.
generic-delete-error: An error occurred while attempting to delete the file.
attachment-prerequisites: You will be able to add attachments once the required fields have been completed and the communication has been saved.
end-date-after-error: End Date must be after Start Date
end-time-after-error: End Time must be after Start Time
end-date-before-today-error: End Date must be after today
search-for-state: Search for a state or province
auto-translate-disclaimer: By selecting auto-translate, only your currently selected language will be updated. Existing translations in other languages won't change and must be updated individually.

translation-confirmation-error.title: Error: Confirmation Required
translation-confirmation-error.message: Please confirm that you have the required permissions or approvals

acknowledgement-approval: By submitting this form, I confirm I have the required permissions or approvals from my supervisor/manager.
acknowledgement-user-notification: I understand that submitting this form will notify all intended eligible users.
